help-file.title: "REMOVE CURSE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
This spell will remove a "curse" on any person or item. To remove a curse on a person caused by an object, the person must first consent you. Once you cast the spell on them, the cursed item will drop from their inventory. You must then pick up that item and re-cast the spell on the object directly.
